Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent;
enabled = true function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end
enabled = false mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\ArrowFarCursor.png"
wait(3) mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\ArrowCursor.png" enabled = true
end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\ArrowCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)

bombScript = script.Parent.Bomb Tool = script.Parent
function plant(pos)
local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
local spawnPos = vCharacter.PrimaryPart.Position
local bomb = Tool.Handle:Clone() bomb.CanCollide = true bomb.Transparency = 0 bomb.Position = pos bomb.Size = Vector3.new(2,2,2) bomb.Name = "FuseBomb" bomb.Locked = true
local spark = Instance.new("Sparkles") spark.Name = "Fuse" spark.Parent = bomb
local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = vPlayer creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = bomb
bomb.Parent = game.Workspace local new_script = bombScript:clone() new_script.Disabled = false new_script.Parent = bomb
end
Tool.Enabled = true function onActivated()
if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint
Tool.Handle.Transparency = 1 plant(Tool.Handle.Position) wait(3) Tool.Handle.Transparency = 0
Tool.Enabled = true end
script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated)

FuseSound = Instance.new("Sound") FuseSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=11565378" FuseSound.Parent = script.Parent FuseSound:Play() local Handle = script.Parent
local total_time = 5 -- seconds local cur_time = 0
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
function update(frac) script.Parent.Fuse.Color = Color3.new(0, 0, 1) end
function blowUp() local sound = Instance.new("Sound") sound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=25869492" sound.Parent = script.Parent sound.Volume = 1 sound:play()
for i = 1,12 do
flower1 = Instance.new("Part") flower1Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") if i < 5 then flower1.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Light blue") elseif i > 4 and i < 9 then flower1.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Alder") else flower1.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Deep orange") end flower1.Size = Vector3.new(1,1.2,1) flower1.formFactor = 2 flower1.CanCollide = true flower1.Locked = true flower1Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=16659363" flower1Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1,2,1) flower1Mesh.Parent = flower1
flowerPos = Vector3.new(Handle.Position.x + math.random(i - 4, i + 4), Handle.Position.y, Handle.Position.z) flower1.Position = flowerPos flower1.Parent = game.Workspace debris:addItem(flower1,60) force = Instance.new("BodyForce") force.force = Vector3.new(0,math.random(300,500),0) force.Parent = flower1 debris:AddItem(force,0.1) debris:AddItem(flower1,30)
end
for i= 1,4 do
flower1 = Instance.new("Part") flower1Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") flower1.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Brown") flower1.Size = Vector3.new(2,2.8,2) flower1.CanCollide = true flower1.Locked = true flower1Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=16215991" flower1Mesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=16216333" flower1Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(2,2,2) flower1Mesh.Parent = flower1
flowerPos = Vector3.new(Handle.Position.x + math.random(i - 3, i + 2), Handle.Position.y, Handle.Position.z) flower1.Position = flowerPos flower1.Parent = game.Workspace force = Instance.new("BodyForce") force.force = Vector3.new(math.random(-50,50),math.random(3000,4000),math.random(-51,53)) force.Parent = flower1 debris:AddItem(force,0.1) debris:AddItem(flower1,40)
end
Handle.Transparency = 1 end
while cur_time < total_time do update(cur_time / total_time) local e,g = wait(.5) cur_time = cur_time + e end
blowUp() wait(.1) script.Parent:remove()
